[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]The mouth is a mirror to our body therefore always important to keep it very clean. Our dental clinic is equipped to provide a complete range of treatment including;

  • General dentistry, childern’s dentistry,
  • Restorative services(fillings / cement)
  • Proffessional cleaning,
  • Root canal therapy,
  • Artifical teeth replacement (Bridges, Dentures, crowning), and Extractions.

We also give advise on proper home dental maintanance.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Mon – Fri    8am -7pm

SAT          9am – 1pm
Thanks for choosing Doctors’ Hospital Dental Clinic. For quality health care.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5162″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5164″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5166″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
